channel.title: What script to make to get accepted?
channel.description:
basically i want to get into the SRL community but wanted to know whats the easiest script that will get you accepted, i mean i dont want to be making long and confusing script if i can get away with making a basic easier script!!
thanks

item.title: What script to make to get accepted?
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

i will do soon im just still researching…

and feeeeeeeeeeeewwww its so much easier to see how eveyone else does scripts then when you try your self its alot harder! lol

anyway i have the spirit to do it so thats what im gonna do

Read full topic

item.title: What script to make to get accepted?
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

woot bebe i cheated on you :p(and you dont know it yet). am i one of the only people that got into (with appling) srl memer without posting a script :p!

see she accepted me in here because of trust that i was going to make play varrock or was it star?
__

ya try making somthing unique because then you would quickly be accepted cause we know your here to help :p.

@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Make a script that shows your scripting talent, and please don’t try to cheat me

I have seen this thread and will take this into consideration when you apply for SRL membership.
